name: Space Scavenger
description:
Space Scavenger is a game about building up and blowing up spaceships in tight gravity based levels. Survive the unique and increasingly alien-infested galaxies by scavenging powerful spaceship parts and sparse resources.



  • On-the-fly intuitive ship building
  • Explore a range of strange planets
  • Battle unique enemies
  • Procedurally generated levels
  • Permadeath



Grow and upgrade your ship from simple beginnings to epic battleships with intuitive on-the-fly ship building. Journey through procedurally generated levels, find new unique ship parts, explore strange alien planets and encounter weird enemies that will surprise you every time you play.



Use gravity and the environment to your advantage while exploring mysterious planets. Command your spaceship decisively as one simple mistake could be the end of your journey.
